name: Life is Colorful
description:
Follow young Joseph on his quest to save his father!

Cursed by the witch while trying to get the only potion that can save his father, he must now commit bad deeds to survive the amulet’s curse. However if he carries out too many bad deeds, the color from his life will drain, and cause him to turn into a demon… 

You must find the balance within Joseph’s actions as he travels through the town and the villages. And help him save his father! 

Will you succumb to the evil within the amulet? Will you refuse to stray from the path of good? You only live once, after all. You must choose your actions carefully.

No external free 2-D assets were used in this game. All were made by our artists.
